forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny. High near 65, with temperatures falling to around 60 in the afternoon. West southwest wind 3 to 7 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 50. West southwest wind around 7 mph.

weather_report:
This morning in Downtown San Francisco, the city awakens under mostly sunny skies, the horizon brightening as the day begins. As you gaze out, you may notice the delicate quality of light—a soft illumination that hints at warmth despite cool temperatures. The high gently approaches 65, though as the afternoon settles in, it may drop to around 60, suggesting a day that gradually unfurls calmness but retains a light chill. The west-southwest winds, playful and mild at about 7 mph, add a rhythmic whisper to the air.

As the day unfolds into evening, the clouds will mingle with the clear spaces above, casting a soft cover that promises a low around 50 tonight. The marine layer may linger on the peripheries, offering a gentle reminder of the sea, while the crisp air invites layered attire—think light jackets or cozy sweaters alongside comfortable shoes, perfect for a leisurely stroll. Given these conditions, a relaxed afternoon could be spent exploring the charming streets of the city or perhaps finding a quiet café to enjoy a warm beverage while watching life unfold outside the window, each moment wrapped in the understated elegance of a San Francisco day.
